description:
Experience peak performance and unmatched comfort with these cold weather hybrid pants. These pants are engineered with strategically placed fabric panels, combining the best of both worlds to elevate your outdoor experience. Featuring a brushed jersey back leg for a cozy fit and warmth, and a stretch woven front leg for wind protection, these pants are your go-to choice for cold weather adventures.

  • Multiple pockets, providing ample storage solutions for your essentials, so you can focus on your journey
  • Strategic paneling not only enhances their visual appeal but also optimizes performance, making them ideal for various outdoor activities
  • Semi-fitted style that strikes the perfect balance between comfort and functionality
  • 28” inseam
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Journey Cold Weather Hybrid Pant - Women's
